EpochX: genetic programming software for research
2010.08.20 Version 1.2
-------------------------------------------------

Backwards compatible: No
(*non-backwards changes marked with an asterisk)

FEATURE: Common | ScriptingInterpreter for extending grammar language support.
FEATURE: All    | New built in models for all representations.

CHANGE: Common  | *Evaluator and Executor replaced by simplified Interpreter interface.
CHANGE: Common  | Grammar checking for infinite recursion and other invalid grammars.
CHANGE: All     | Significant extensions to JavaDoc, particularly for Common.
CHANGE: All     | *Generalisation of models, for example EvenParity replaces Even[3/4/5]Parity.
CHANGE: XGE     | Added useful accessor/mutator methods to operators.

BUGFIX: All     | Numerous minor unlisted bug fixes.
